entries.title_d: Several Black Sun ship managed to slip by our and Nym's blockade and the mining vessels are under attack. Assist and save as many of them as you can.
entries.title: Dathomir system: Save the Nym freighters from total annihilation.
entries.quest_location_d: Although this part of the Dathomir system is relatively free from hostile ships normally, it's now crawling with Black Sun bombers and fighters.
entries.quest_helpallies_d: We need to save what can be saved. Assist the Nym Fighters and Freighters in this area and terminate the Black Sun threat.
entries.quest_findbattle_d: These are your assigned coordinates, you will find some mining vessels under heavy attack by the Black Sun.
entries.found_loc: We need your help at this location! Now pilot!
entries.enemies_win: I'm going down! Save yourself pi..
entries.enemies_remain: Tactical Computer: < Scans show enemy vessel terminated. %DI remain. >
entries.enemies_arrived: We have multiple Black Sun fighter ships closing in, we need help now!
entries.battle_started: They are locking on to me, this is going to hurt!
entries.allies_win: At least they didn't get us all. Return to base before more of them arrive pilot.
entries.allies_remain: Nym Freighter Pilot: < Too much damage! We have massive hull brea... >
entries.allies_arrived: Some of the Black Sun Fighters got past you? We need to get out of here!
